about_the_game:
Fight with blades and wits in this one hour adaptation of the classic stage play, Cyrano de Bergerac!

Cyrano is the greatest swordsman and wordsmith in all of France. He also has the largest nose and the fiercest temper.

He has stood alone against a hundred soldiers and can best the wits of any poet alive, but when he falls in love with Roxane, he is hopeless. Could Roxane love a man with a giant nose?

Meanwhile, Roxane has fallen for a beautiful young soldier,

And Cyrano sees an opportunity to share his heart but hide his face.

Command your small band of friends in turn based battles!

Journey from Paris to Arras to fight for friendship, honor and love.

Compose love letters using your own words to win Roxane’s heart!

Collect the full deck of prompt cards to inspire your writing!

Become the poet, the lover, the friend and the fighter.

Take center stage in one of the greatest plays ever written!
